source_objects.description: Learn best practices and advice on how to create a compelling personal brand.
source_objects.title: Personal Brand Building

items.title: Top 10 List for Exceptional Presales
items.headline: We will discuss the art of exceptional presales and how to build rapport with customers to become a trusted advisor.
objectives_summary: Presales lays the groundwork for the sale to succeed.  This curriculum will help students learn a successful approach to presales along with the behaviors and habits that will help make them exceptional presales specialists.

items.title: The Hermitage EAGLE Programme
items.headline: The Hermitage EAGLE Programme - Campus to Corporate
objectives_summary: Students will learn essential life skills for the corporate world.
This programme will help students prepare to step in to a corporate of their choice.
Participants of this programme gain a headstart over other students at the time of placement.

objectives_summary: Discover Reason, Why You deserve to be an Author?
Selection of Appropriate Subject/Title to Write a Book
Formula to Complete the Draft Manuscript within 30 Days

items.title: Build Your Leadership Brand For Success - Module 2
items.headline: Are you a leader or managing a team?  This course follows on from Build Your Personal Brand in 8 Easy Steps - Module 1
objectives_summary: You will understand the deep value in building a powerful leadership brand, and develop the insight and ability to have the presence and impact you need.
You will learn to deliver value as a leader through your actions and behaviours and to create trust in your abilities as a leader.
You will learn what leadership is, where you lead from and why others follow you.

items.title: Succeed As A Data Science Writer On Medium
items.headline: Data scientists + other data & tech pros can grow successes writing at Medium
objectives_summary: How to create an account on Medium, and join the partner program.
How to write articles that will share your knowledge, and earn side-income.
How to use the Medium editor, source images, structure an article, choose headings, etc.

items.title: Learn Personal Branding for Ministry
items.headline: Connecting with your deeper self to discover and align with purpose.
objectives_summary: Discover your divine purpose
Identify your values
Unearth your motivators

items.title: Engage on LinkedIn to Get Opportunities with Decision-Makers
items.headline: The Advanced LinkedIn Constant Engagement as seen in the 2020 Edition of the Advanced LinkedIn book and methodology.
objectives_summary: You will learn that your opinion is valuable and that you have what it takes to engage with c-level executives and decision-makers.
You will learn how to be consistent in the way you interact on LinkedIn and establish a routine that fits your busy days.
You will learn how to generate opportunities from the milestones that your connections reveal on the network, and how this keeps your LinkedIn profile more trustworthy.

items.title: The only key to success
items.headline: The blueprint to become the preferred expert
objectives_summary: Learn what you can do today to start earning more money from your expertise.
Learn what you need to do today to start becoming more successful and more influential.
Learn how to add massive value to yourself and how it helps you to be a successful person.

items.title: Master Public Speaking
items.headline: Designing and Presenting Transformational Messages
objectives_summary: In Master Public Speaking, learners will be taught how to develop and present transformational content. They will learn the art of public speaking and how to brand themselves as Master Speakers. Additionally, learners will enhance their presentation skills including designing classic presentation slides and keeping the audience engaged and enlivened by the presenter.

items.title: How to Write, Publish & Sell Your True Crime Book
items.headline: Learn how to find a compelling case, agent and craft a book and pitch that sells.
objectives_summary: Attendees will leave this course knowing how to find a case, write a winning book proposal, find an agent, build an audience and more.

items.title: Write a Bestselling Non-Fiction Book In Less Than 20 Hours
items.headline: You have a book inside you. Get started on sharing your unique story with the world today. Finish your book next week.
objectives_summary: Write a complete manuscript in a week using my proven system! 20 hours start to finish. No tricks, games or gimmicks!
Plan, structure, outline your book in its entirety.
Beat writerâ€™s block and unleash the story inside of you! Explore new and unthought of topics for your writing.

objectives_summary: Have a website/blog of your own on the Internet
Add interesting and relevant content to your site

items.title: Create and Automate Problem-Solving Content on LinkedIn
items.headline: The Advanced LinkedIn Content Authoring as seen in the 2020 Edition of the Advanced LinkedIn book and methodology.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to think and act as a 21st-Century professional and become the top talent demanded by businesses nowadays.
You will learn how to use LinkedIn as a social tool and build an audience that will follow you, engage with your content and eventually buy the product "You."
You will learn about the two streams of content and how to re-purpose the content you create into an automated process that will work for you even when you are not on LinkedIn.
